Articles.Content:
My friend sent this to me after landing on the Island runway, I'm sure people have have found this before but I haven't

I've played since .16 but I'm more of a space guy, he prefers planes.

Edited July 9, 2013 by Marshmallow_Man
Er, I know what the picture is of, but only because this is commonly known, your picture is far too small to see anything.
It's the rusty old parts. A cool easter egg for sure, just like the capsule memorial behind the VAB.

-snip-

Yup! Never seen it before either. I just knew about it because of this thread. Thanks for sharing, OP!

Edited July 9, 2013 by KasperVld

Wow nice find! I never knew about that.

I guess its time to load up in a plane and check it out!

OP, I knew about it, but had never seen an image of it. Thanks for that. Old timer here, too.

-snip-

Edited July 9, 2013 by KasperVld

Hehe, nice Marshmallow_Man, there are plenty of things like that around for you to find. Please post them in here everytime you find 1. Oh wait, Orange7093 won't approve of that... but what the hell, we are all interested of our Communities Journey's in KSP, it brings us satisfaction to know we are kinda like a family here, so post away.

-snip-

Edited July 9, 2013 by KasperVld

Old timer here as well, and TBH even though i landed a few times on the isle runway, i never took notice of it.. since i dont play alot with space planes, only landed there too see IF i could land there..

I must shamefully admit, that i explored nearly all anomalies on all planets, but Kerbin itself is largely Unexplored by me

-snip-

So thanks OP for pointing it out, have too seek that one up today and see it for myself as an old timer..

Edited July 9, 2013 by KasperVld

never been there, only know it exists because I happened to see it mentioned in some of Scott Manley's videos.

Might get around to going there some day.

Never seen a Mun arch or any other easter egg either, even in the distance. Maybe I should set up something in 10km Munar polar orbit and start plotting, but tbh I can't be bothered.
Nice find! I actually didn't know it was there either. Welcome to the forums and KSP fellow Kerbalnaut!

Thread closed for cleaning. (10 minutes)

Thread re-opened

Edited July 9, 2013 by KasperVld
There's also a 2nd space center on Kerbin, as well as a "monolith" just north of KSC. Saw some screenshots of a "cave" crater on Moho, I may have to check it out sometime.
Tell your friend he has a nice window and interesting furniture, also the F1 key gets a screenshot in the screenshots folder in the game folder by the way.

This was the first thing I did when 0.18 came out. Also you can take screenshots with the F1 key.

forum gestapo everywhere
